title: How can someone browse the list of freely available books for Kindle? - Quora

response.answer_text: My book is FREE until the 29th! The Fairy Squad Princesses: A Magical Awakening - Kindle edition by Marcus Moutra, Scotty McCoy. Literature & Fiction Kindle eBooks @ Amazon.com. Also in order to see a list of free kindle books you can simply search in Free Books in the search bar on Amazon. However, if you want a certain genre for example fantasy, if you scroll down the page of a book you can click one of the hashtags under the Product Details, and it will bring you to the Top 100 Paid for, and the Top 100 Free books within that genre. Here’s the example if you were to click on my link and scroll down:

I go to my Amazon account and in the Kindle category, I search for “genre” and “free.” The list that comes up will include mostly free books. “Genre” is whatever type of book you prefer, i.e., “time travel” “free” or “fantasy” “free” or “science fiction” “free” or “bibliography” “free,” etc.
